communication_style.sarcasm_rate: Lecture tone; pseudo-scientific framing; frame women as objects with market value.

narratives.c_essay: Women are like commodities in a dating market, their value determined by their physical appearance and youth. Men must improve themselves to increase their value and attract high-value women.
narratives.p_intro: Welcome to my channel, where I lecture on the harsh realities of the dating market and how men can improve their value to attract the women they deserve.
